Feedback Summary.description: A concise summary of the overall evaluation of the chart review output.

Strengths.description: Detailed identification of the strengths in the synthesis of clinical issues, and inclusion of differential diagnoses.

Areas for Improvement.description: Detailed identification of the areas of improvement in the synthesis of clinical issues, and inclusion of differential diagnoses.
